experience.name: MO Tecnologías
description: Working with agile methodologies such as Scrum, to create resilient web applications for clients and internal projects using mainly Django, Angular, and React.
Using AWS to create auto-scalable and serverless architecture to support multi-systems through multi-account and new technologies for network, communication, and security.
Design and create internal platforms to help development teams, incorporating libraries, automated scripts, platforms to manage automatic deployment and ease communication.

experience.name: Panzofi
description:
I’m in charge of AWS architecture, the deployment, and CI/CD for each service; also, I work as fullstack developer being leader in development area working with django and React.
I was handle all related infrastructure and internal process to the prototype of https://panzofi.com.

experience.name: Pontifical Javerian University
description: I had to attend the teacher, answering questions from the students, supporting them in workshops, partials and projects, as well as classes apart from accompaniment in which the students attended with questions.
I had to prepare the workshops about variables, conditionals, functions, and basic data structures in C++ and python, to help students to study for their exams.
I teach about HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript, using tools and frameworks as SCSS, and Pug, their workshops, was focused on frontend development, with examples exposed on my CodePen profile.
